title: Fireball Cider Jello Shots
directions: In a small saucepan, add apple cider and lemon juice. Sprinkle over gelatin and let bloom, about 5 minutes. Place pan over medium heat and bring to a simmer, stirring to dissolve gelatin. Stir in Fireball and remove from heat. Pour into shot glasses and refrigerate, until firm, for about 2 hours. Top with whipped cream, a sprinkle of cinnamon, and an apple slice.
